content.name: graph
content.description: this component generates a graph of a specified type based on the data it receives from its predecessor

content.name: filter
content.description: this component receives a table from its predecessor and filter specified columns

content.name: file reader
content.description: this component reads data from .csv and .json files and save it in a database

content.name: file input
content.description: this component access the local storage to convert raw data into data in useful format for other components

content.name: api input
content.description: This component is used to ingest data from an API specified by the user

content.name: api parser
content.description: This component standardizes the raw data obtained from APIs through the api-input component

content.name: file typing
content.description: this component attempts to correctly define the types of the data provided based on the user's input

content.name: clear data
content.description: this component cleans the database

content.name: list tables
content.description: This component lists all the tables that are saved in the local database

content.name: linear regression
content.description: this component applies a linear regression model to the data provided, generating a line which best represents the model

content.name: cluster
content.description: this component applies a clustering model to the data provided

content.name: PCA
content.description: this component applies a PCA model to reduce the dimensionality of the data provided to one or two dimensions

content.name: groupby
content.description: this component groups the rows of the given table

content.name: columnOp
content.description: this component does an operation between columns and generates a table with the previous table plus the resulting column

content.name: columnOpConstant
content.description: this component does an operation between columns and generates a table with the previous table plus the resulting column

content.name: deleteColumn
content.description: this component excludes a column.

content.name: minimum
content.description: this component finds and returns the minimum value of the column.

content.name: maximum
content.description: this component finds and returns the maximum value of the column.

content.name: count
content.description: this component counts how many times the element appears in the column.

content.name: unique
content.description: this component counts how many unique values ​​are present in the column.

content.name: orderBy
content.description: this component sorts rows based on a column's value in ascending or descending order.

content.name: mean
content.description: this component finds and returns the mean value of the column.

content.name: median
content.description: this component finds and returns the value corresponding to the column median.

content.name: mode
content.description: this component finds and returns the value corresponding to the mode of the column.

content.name: standarddeviation
content.description: this component finds and returns the value corresponding to the population standard deviation of the column.

content.name: alias
content.description: this component changes the name of a table column

content.name: zScoreNorm
content.description: this component performs a normalization of the data in a column.

content.name: join
content.description: this component merges two tables based on a column
